name: NATIONAL WOODEN PALLET AND CONTAINER ASSOCIATION
description: Advocate on behalf of wood pallet manufacturing industry.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress and staff on the role and importance of the wood pallet industry. Advocate for support of sustainable forestry on federal lands, common sense immigration reform and manufac
Engage Congress on issues related to the upcoming Farm Bill.
